welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Putte, a charming city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mostly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
